.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.2.name: vmwNetName
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.2.description: String describing the network adapter. Format: vmnic*

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.3.name: vmwNetVMID
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.3.description: ID assigned to running vm by the vmkernel.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.4.name: vmwNetIfAddr
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.4.description: MAC address of vm's virtual NIC.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.5.name: vmwNetShares
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.5.description: Share of net bandwidth allocated to this vm.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.6.name: vmwNetPktsTx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.6.description: Number of pkts transmitted on this NIC since network module was loaded. Deprecated in favour of pktsHCTx.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.7.name: vmwNetKbTx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.7.description: Kilobytes sent from this NIC since network module was loaded. Deprecated in favour of kbHCTx.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.8.name: vmwNetPktsRx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.8.description: Number of pkts received on this NIC since network module was loaded. Deprecated in favour of pktsHCRx.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.9.name: vmwNetKbRx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.9.description: Kilobytes received on this NIC since network module was loaded. Deprecated in favour of kbHCRx.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.10.name: vmwNetHCPktsTx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.10.description: Number of pkts transmitted on this NIC since network module was loaded.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.11.name: vmwNetHCKbTx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.11.description: Kilobytes sent from this NIC since network module was loaded.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.12.name: vmwNetHCPktsRx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.12.description: Number of pkts received on this NIC since network module was loaded.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.13.name: vmwNetHCKbRx
.1.3.6.1.4.1.6876.3.4.1.13.description: Kilobytes received on this NIC since network module was loaded.
